Hello people across Lebanon! If you ever feel in danger, call 1564, our new suicide prevention helpline. They can also help in leading you to the nearest mental health services in your area. I personally recommend Dr. Ghina Ismail, a psychotherapist in AUBMC. She is excellent. I also recommend Mia Atwi, a psychotherapist who used to work in AUBMC but now opened her own clinic, please refer to AUBMC to get her contact info. You can always DM me if you do not know how to start or where to go. üíï
